name: Mazeotaur
description:
I had an all nighter before I started. I passed out twice first day. I had a 30 kilometre bike ride. And now I have this. There's no actual fail state. You end the game by killing all the victims.

An entry for Ludum Dare 33.

You are the minotaur in a maze. Kill everyone.

Controls:

W - forward

S - backwards

Mouse - look direction

Left Mouse Click - attack victim - must be close.
